ComicInfo.Penciller: Bernard Baily,Bob Brown,Edwin Smalle,George Roussos,Henry Boltinoff,Will Ely,Bernard Baily,Bill Ely,George Roussos,Bob Brown,Ed Smalle,Henry Boltinoff
ComicInfo.Summary:
A strange spacecraft flying through Earth's atmosphere emits anti-gravity rays that cause anything they touch to float away.
The Great Jakarta, a stage magician, tries to prove to his students that there is no such thing as real magic.
Reporter Joe Lipari encounters a Martian who switches bodies with him.
Sir Gawain is fighting a dragon in King Arthur's time when he and the dragon are transported to modern-day New York City by a bolt of lightning.
Sgt. Charles D. Engel, shot down over the Atlantic, was lost at sea for twenty-one days before being recovered.
The doctor's expedition to space doesn't get very far.
ComicInfo.Tags: Arizona,Dragons,New York City,United States Army,Sir Gawain,Atlantic Ocean,Doctor Rocket
ComicInfo.Writer: George Kashdan,Henry Boltinoff,Jack Schiff,Mort Weisinger,Jack Schiff,Mort Weisinger,George Kashdan,Henry Boltinoff
ComicInfo.Title: The Anti-Gravity Menace; The School for Sorcerers; The Man with the Martian Body; The Dragon of Times Square; The Man Who Refused to Die!
